attributes.additional_details: The UK needs transparency. This issue will not go away. The whole world is watching.
attributes.background: Put further pressure on the people who govern us. The people need answer’s for the atrocities taken place against British families and bring justice to all those who suffered.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
